full_summary:
### Public Tenders and Requests for Proposal: Portable Magnetic Probe

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS3659749928-Doc3737717406

**Tender Title:** Portable Magnetic Probe for the Department of National Defence

**Conversion Spec:** Laboratory implements

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Brief Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the provision of a portable magnetic resonance probe and spectrometer system equipped with a permanent magnet. The successful offeror will be required to provide a complete, single-sided system to the  Chemical Engineering Department of the Royal Military College of Canada.

**Key Requirements**

* Portable and single-sided magnetic resonance probe and spectrometer system
* Equipped with a permanent magnet
* Delivered to the Department of National Defence (DND) at the Royal Military College of Canada

#### Tender and Proposal Submission

* Closing Date:  November 25, 2022, 14:00:00 UTC
* Note: Any proposals received after the designated deadline will not be accepted.
* Contact Information:
	+ Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Phone: [Not Available]
	+ Email: [darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darwin.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There are no regional opportunities available.

#### Notice URL

The complete tender notice and more information about this opportunity can be found on Ariba's Discovery Platform at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14552626?extsite=MTQ1NTI2MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14552626?extsite=MTQ1NTI2MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
